text: Raul Maravilla Gonzalez (December 3, 1930 â€“ September 7, 2014) was a Filipino politician. He served as the Chief Presidential Legal Counsel and was the Former Secretary of Justice of the Philippines. Gonzalez Sr. died on September 7, 2014, of complications due to multiple organ failure at the Philippine General Hospital. ==References== ==Other websites== *Government Profile *DOJ Profile *Supreme Court Profile *DOJ notice Category:1930 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Politicians from Western Visayas Category:People from Negros Occidental
